ygData.subject: Re: Why are you playing a SK
ygData.msgSnippet: I completely agree with you. Being a warrior AND having a pet distinguishes us from the everyday fighter. Also, there s just something about a Dark Elf Shadow
ygData.messageBody:
I completely agree with you. Being a warrior AND having a pet distinguishes
us from the everyday fighter. Also, there's just something about a Dark Elf
Shadow Knight with Blackened Armor that makes them one of my favorite
combinations. Btw, does anyone think the Vampiric Embrace is completely
useless at level 22?


>Since everyone has been quite for awhile, I thought
>I'd ask why everyone is playing a SK. I am a Troll
>SK and the reason why I'm playing it is because I like
>the idea of being evil plus being able to wield a 2h
>sword while commanding a pet is just plain fun.
